davinci.title: Da Vinci, Art School
davinci.description: Here's where everything started. I remember to have created a few static pages with HTML and CSS during web design classes. These subjects such as UI/UX Design and Web Programming caught my attention completely and I felt like 'ok, definitely I need to know more'.

acamica.title: Full Stack bootcamp
acamica.description: My first proffesional approach to web programming and the community from Argentina. Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Minima tenetur corrupti officia quasi, eligendi facere molestiae ratione. Sed, id consequatur? Architecto quod quibusdam ab? Enim minima culpa perferendis quasi asperiores.

oracle.title: Frontend Developer, CX Consultant (Oracle Commerce Cloud)
oracle.description: As soon I felt ready, I began seeking my first job and my place in the IT industry. I never imagined my journery would start at Oracle. As Frontend Engineer / Oracle Commerce Cloud Consultant (working with their giant, large-scale ecommerce tool, based in the cloud), my mission was to address all client concerns regarding the platform and work on customization for their sites. This experience provided me with valuable skills and insights that I continue to use today in my current role as a Frontend Engineer. In particular, my work on customizing the Oracle Commerce Cloud platform gave me a deep understanding of the ecommerce business and the importance of delivering an intuitive user experience.

fizzmod.title: Frontend Developer
fizzmod.description: After a year at Oracle, and knowing where I want to led my career to, I joined Fizzmod after had been selected among 20 candidates in a intense React JS paid training. They opened two junior frontend positions and one of the selected ones was me. Their core business was focused around Ecommerce as well but this time partering with Vtex. As a junior developer, I worked as one of the maintainer of their legacy apps using Jquery, Javascript Vanilla and Vtex SDK's. And also got the chance to deliver features by using React JS and it's ecosystem, for some of their principal customers like Walmart and Jumbo.

blockfi.title: Frontend Team Lead
blockfi.description: Definitely, the most meaningful experience so far. I joined the Blockfi team as junior/mid-level Frontend Engineer in a pretty early stage, and after delivered our first product for institutional clients, I was promoted to a Team Lead position. I got three people in charge, and togheter we built an entire onboarding application from scratch  using Typescript and React (and leveraging the entire React ecosystem!). My role was based half heads down, and half managing and following up the team, planning and scoping our tasks. I learned the core concepts of SLDC and had the chance to learn from worldclass engineers. Blockfi filed for bankruptcy in December 2022.

coderio.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
coderio.description: Early February, I started a new charpter at Coderio, a Staff Augmentation company as Senior Frontend, exclusively bringing service to Dlocal, an stablished company that offers payments routing system solutions in the emergent market.
